body_html: The sys.exit never gets called. The point is that doing this urlopen causes the DataLoader to hang. I encountered it first in a case where the urlopen failed and so I had to catch the exception. But actually it doesn't matter if the urlopen fails or succeeds.
body_text: The sys.exit never gets called.  The point is that doing this urlopen causes the DataLoader to hang.  I encountered it first in a case where the urlopen failed and so I had to catch the exception.  But actually it doesn't matter if the urlopen fails or succeeds.
body: The `sys.exit` never gets called.  The point is that doing this `urlopen` causes the `DataLoader` to hang.  I encountered it first in a case where the `urlopen` failed and so I had to catch the exception.  But actually it doesn't matter if the `urlopen` fails or succeeds.
